block.p: ALEXANDER - Claire. Passed away peacefully Sept. 18th, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Seymour. Cherished mother of Margot and Harris. Dearest mother-in-law of Ray. Adoring grandmother of Brian, Julie and Jesse. Loving sister of Morton. Caring sister-in-law of Susan. Dear aunt of James and Cynthia. With fond memories and much love. Services will be held at Midwood Chapel, 1625 Coney Island Avenue, Brooklyn, Thursday, September 21st, at 9:45 AM.
